definitions.definition: A group of people organized for a common purpose .
examples: a work brigade ; a fire brigade

definitions.definition: Military unit composed of several regiments (or battalions ) and including soldiers from different arms of service.
A group of people who share views or a specific characteristic .
examples: More sympathy for career criminals from the bleeding-heart brigade !
I wouldn't even want to be seen dead with those nerds of the bowl-cut brigade .

definitions.definition: Coordinated online harassment , disruption or influencing , especially organized by an antagonistic website or community .

main_definition: A group of people organized for a common purpose .
secondary_definitions: ( military ) Military unit composed of several regiments (or battalions ) and including soldiers from different arms of service.
( derogatory ) A group of people who share views or a specific characteristic .
( Internet slang ) Coordinated online harassment , disruption or influencing , especially organized by an antagonistic website or community .
